<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/accounts/{account_id}/transfers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new transfer using the specified source and destination details.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"account_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"},"description":"The ID of the account"},{"in":"header","name":"Idempotency-Key","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"idemp-123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000","description":"A unique string used to prevent duplicate operations. >
  
</ParamsDetails>
